channel.title: Restaurant on Pastel Cravings
channel.description: Recent content in Restaurant on Pastel Cravings

item.title: Kyomi
item.description: When you step in the restaurant, it’s like entering a whole new world (believe me, you can’t tell from outside). The decor screams romantic and modern asian fusion. It’s the perfect place to bring in your date or a family gathering. I ordered the Salmon Tartare (meal version comes with sweet potatoes so why not?! :D) AND THIS RIGHT HERE IS HEAVEN. It’s sweet and light, the asian inspiration crispy crackers go very well with this tartare.

It’s the perfect place to bring in your date or a family gathering. I ordered the Salmon Tartare (meal version comes with sweet potatoes so why not?! :D) AND THIS RIGHT HERE IS HEAVEN. It’s sweet and light, the asian inspiration crispy crackers go very well with this tartare.

item.title: Kumamoto Ramen
item.description: When I heard about this new ramen place in town, I couldn’t be happier. Because more ramen is always good. What’s cool about this new restaurant is the isolation booth concept. You have these wood panels separating you and you neighbors. You have a little button for ordering food and an autorefill water system.Then you receive your bowl of ramen through a curtain covered window. Unique Ramen I ordered a Black Tonkotsu Ramen and it was so savoury and delicious!
